thread.section_title: New World Beijing Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic!
thread.title_full: Fantastic! - Review of New World Beijing Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Naadira P
title: Fantastic!
text: The hotel is beautiful and situated in a good area. The staff is exceptional, extremely helpful and friendly with the added bonus of being able to speak very good English. The facilities at the hotel are great- I mare use of the swimming pool, jacuzzi and spa. Overall, I Enjoyed my stay thoroughly and will definitely go back.
